text: The Life of Emile Zola is a 1937 American biographical movie. This is about Émile Zola and his rise to fame in 19th century. The movie starred Paul Muni as Émile Zola. It was directed William Dieterle. At the 10th Annual Academy Awards, the movie was the second biographical movie to win the Best Picture Academy Award. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:1937 movies Category:1930s biographical movies Category:American biographical movies Category:1930s American drama movies Category:Movies featuring a Best Supporting Actor Academy Award-winning performance Category:Movies set in France Category:Movies set in the 19th century Category:Movies set in the 1860s Category:Movies set in the 1880s Category:Movies set in the 1890s Category:Movies set in the 1900s Category:Movies set in Paris Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by William Dieterle Category:Movies about writers
title: The Life of Emile Zola
